None.Name: Rock Shot
None.Description: Every second, tower shoots bouncing rocks that deal 36 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 54 in total. Affects air targets only.

None.Name: Tainted Gravity Surge
None.Description: Activate to tear a flying enemy down to the ground. The caught flyer will then be enchained the the ground for 25 seconds and can no longer move. It will be immune against range or magical attacks but ground units will be able to attack it while it is bound. Reusable every 30 seconds.
